oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SEICHE IN PORTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Apte, A.S.
Marcou, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: seiche
ports
wave period
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In his thesis Prof. John S. McHewn has given an account of experiments on seiche in port models. Though the fundamental causes of seiche in harbours and ports are more or less known, we have little knowledge of the harbour dimensions for which a particular seiche is likely to occur. A systematic study was therefore initiated by Prof. McNown and our work described in this paper may be considered as its continuation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 5 (1954): Proceedings of 5th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Grenoble, France, 1954.; 8
